snippet: Heyward and Freeman, both 24 and part of the Atlanta Braves’ core of young stars, signed multi-year contracts after filing for salary arbitration last month.
abstract: Atlanta Braves agree to eight-year contract, worth approximately $125 million, with first baseman Freddie Freeman.
lead_paragraph: Heyward and Freeman, both 24 and part of the Atlanta Braves’ core of young stars, signed multi-year contracts after filing for salary arbitration last month.

headline.main: Braves Reach Agreements With Freeman and Heyward
headline.print_headline: Braves Reach Agreements With Freeman and Heyward
